summary_detail.value: Lincoln Co. Sheriff has issued an additional Evacuation Order for the West Kootenai North and South Zones. At this time these Evacuation Orders affect the communities of Dodge Creek, Spring Creek, and West Kootenai. The residents are asked to leave immediately in an orderly fashion. The Lincoln County Sheriff's officers are in the area notifying affected residents.The Red Cross has emergency services set up in the Church of God in Eureka, MT located at 1295 2nd Ave behind the First Interstate Bank.The community meeting planned for the West Kootenai Community at 730 pm has been moved to the Kootenai Fire

title: Additional Evacuation Orders (Caribou Fire Wildfire)
summary: Lincoln Co. Sheriff has issued an additional Evacuation Order for the West Kootenai North and South Zones.
